important_development_note.message: Voice-to-text pattern detection is intentionally excluded for Chinese (and other CJK/Russian languages) due to fundamental differences in input methods and character systems. Only universal patterns (copy/paste, deletion rates, session distribution) are monitored.
important_development_note.description: Documentation note about intentional exclusion of voice detection

extDescription.message: 专为教师开发 - 显示学生在 Google 文档中的编辑历史

stats_copyPaste.description: Label for number of large copy/paste instances

stats_writingSessions.description: Label for number of writing sessions

stats_activeTime.description: Label for total active writing time

tooltip_deletions.message: 删除次数统计文档中文本被删除的次数（例如，按退格键或选择并删除文字）。

tooltip_copyPaste.message: 大段复制/粘贴的次数。注：仅计算20个以上词语或150个以上字符的复制/粘贴。

tooltip_writingSessions.message: 写作会话统计对文档进行修改的不同会话数量。超过5分钟的暂停将被视为新会话。

tooltip_activeTime.message: 实际写作时间测量主动写作或编辑的总时间。超过5分钟的暂停不计入时间。

error_notLoggedIn.message: 请登录 Google 文档以查看修订历史。
error_notLoggedIn.description: Error message when not logged in

error_noAccess.message: 请请求文档的编辑权限以查看修订历史。
error_noAccess.description: Error message when no edit access

login_prompt.message: 查看完整历史 → 使用Google登录

analytics_patterns_normal.description: Message shown when no unusual patterns are detected

analytics_patterns_unusual.description: Message shown when unusual patterns are detected

analytics_patterns_unusual_no_voice.description: Message shown when unusual patterns are detected (excluding voice detection)

analytics_too_short.message: 文档太短，无法进行分析
analytics_too_short.description: Message shown when document is too short for analysis

tooltip_unusual_patterns_simple.message: 查看"详情"获取有关写作模式的更多信息
tooltip_unusual_patterns_simple.description: Simplified tooltip for unusual patterns, directing to Details section

tooltip_too_short.message: 写作分析需要至少750个字符的文本

tooltip_patterns.message: 所有写作模式均显示正常

tooltip_patterns_no_voice.message: 除语音检测外的所有写作模式均显示正常
tooltip_patterns_no_voice.description: Tooltip for normal writing patterns (excluding voice detection)

analytics_warning_context.message: 注意：这些指标建议查看写作过程重放。这些并非特定行为的确定指标。
analytics_warning_context.description: Context message shown when warnings are present

analytics_over_60.message: 超过60%的输入字符被删除
analytics_over_60.description: Message when deletion rate is over 60%

analytics_below_threshold.description: Message when value is below threshold

analytics_above_threshold.description: Message when value is above threshold

analytics_normal_range.description: Message when value is in normal range

auth_google_signin.message: 使用 Google 账号登录

auth_terms_agree.message: 继续即表示您同意修订历史的服务条款和隐私政策，并同意接收定期更新邮件。

auth_terms_link.description: Link text for terms of service

auth_and.description: Conjunction between terms and privacy policy

auth_valid_email.message: 请输入有效的电子邮箱地址。

auth_fill_all.description: Error message when not all fields are filled

tooltip_pattern_rapid_text.message: 多次快速添加大量文本
tooltip_pattern_rapid_text.description: Tooltip explaining rapid text addition pattern

tooltip_pattern_large_chunks.message: 大量文本以大块形式添加

tooltip_pattern_uneven.message: 会话之间的内容分布不均匀

tooltip_pattern_low_deletion.message: 删除率显著低于平均水平
tooltip_pattern_low_deletion.description: Tooltip explaining low deletion rate pattern

flag_result_voice_disabled.message: 语音转文本检测已禁用
flag_result_voice_disabled.description: Message explaining voice detection is disabled

flag_result_voice_excluded.message: 中文不进行语音转文本检测
flag_result_voice_excluded.description: Short message for voice detection exclusion

reset_password_instruction.message: 请输入您的电子邮箱以接收重置密码的验证码。
reset_password_instruction.description: Instruction text for reset password page

reset_password_button.description: Button text to send reset code

enter_valid_email.message: 请输入有效的电子邮箱地址。

reset_code_sent.message: 重置码已发送到您的邮箱。
reset_code_sent.description: Success message after sending reset code

enter_reset_code.message: 请输入发送到您邮箱的重置码

reset_code_label.description: Label for reset code input field

verify_code_button.description: Button text to verify reset code

save_password_button.description: Button text to save new password

passwords_must_match.message: 两次输入的密码必须相同
passwords_must_match.description: Error message when passwords don't match

page_title_reset_password.message: 修订历史 - 重置密码
page_title_reset_password.description: Browser tab title for reset password page

page_title_confirm_email.message: 修订历史 - 确认电子邮箱
page_title_confirm_email.description: Browser tab title for confirm email page

confirm_email_code_sent.message: 我们已向 $EMAIL$ 发送了6位数验证码，请在下方输入。
confirm_email_code_sent.description: Message indicating code has been sent

confirm_email_code_resent.message: 验证码已重新发送。如果在收件箱中没有看到，请检查垃圾邮件文件夹。
confirm_email_code_resent.description: Message shown when code is resent

confirm_email_success_message.message: 您的电子邮箱已成功验证。现在可以登录了。

flag_voice_to_text_explanation.message: 由于输入方法的根本差异，中文不进行语音转文本检测
flag_voice_to_text_explanation.description: Explanation for voice to text detection being disabled

analytics_voice_detected.message: 检测到多个增量文本添加实例
analytics_voice_detected.description: Message when voice patterns are detected

analytics_no_voice_patterns.message: 未检测到语音转文本模式
analytics_no_voice_patterns.description: Message when no voice patterns are found

flag_text_addition_title.description: Title for text addition pattern flag

flag_content_addition_title.description: Title for content addition pattern flag

flag_session_distribution_title.description: Title for session distribution pattern flag

flag_voice_pattern_title.description: Title for voice input pattern flag

flag_editing_pattern_explanation.message: 分析文本编辑的频率和模式

flag_text_addition_explanation.message: 分析文本添加的速度和模式
flag_text_addition_explanation.description: Explanation for text addition pattern flag

flag_content_addition_explanation.message: 分析内容添加的数量和分布
flag_content_addition_explanation.description: Explanation for content addition pattern flag

flag_session_distribution_explanation.message: 分析会话之间的工作分布
flag_session_distribution_explanation.description: Explanation for session distribution pattern flag

flag_text_addition.description: Flag for unusual text addition pattern

flag_content_addition.description: Flag for unusual content addition pattern

tooltip_flag_editing_pattern.message: 测量删除的文本量与添加的文本量之比。较低的删除率可能表明内容是预先准备的，而较高的删除率可能表明进行了大量修订或编辑。

tooltip_flag_text_addition.message: 识别何时快速出现大量文本。这有助于区分手动输入的内容和从其他来源复制或一次性添加的文本。

tooltip_flag_content_addition.message: 显示文档的重要部分何时以大块形式而非逐渐添加。这有助于确定内容是在文档内开发还是在其他地方准备的。

tooltip_flag_session_distribution.message: 检查写作如何分布在不同的工作会话中。不均匀的分布可能表明部分内容在主要写作过程之外开发。

tooltip_flag_voice_to_text.message: 检测语音转文字工具的典型模式，如文本以小片段出现，删除很少，且有特征性的错误模式。

auth_signup_banner.message: 首次创建账户？即使您之前使用过Revision History，您也需要创建一个账户才能继续。
auth_signup_banner.description: Banner message explaining that existing users need to create an account

auth_signup_tooltip.message: 我们更新了注册流程。如果您之前使用Google登录，您需要使用您的电子邮件和密码创建一个新账户。感谢您一直以来的支持！
auth_signup_tooltip.description: Tooltip explaining the sign-up process for existing users

upgrade_document_count.message: 本月您已分析 $COUNT$ 个免费文档，共 $LIMIT$ 个。
upgrade_document_count.description: Shows how many documents have been analyzed out of the monthly limit

upgrade_message.message: 我们从未想到会有这么多教育工作者使用我们的产品。我们非常感激，这是最起码的。现在有超过15万教育工作者正在使用Revision History，订阅可以解锁无限文档分析，并为持续支持和改进提供资金。
upgrade_message.description: Message explaining the need for subscriptions

upgrade_value_proposition.message: 解锁无限分析，深入了解您学生的写作过程。

upgrade_per_month.description: Text indicating price is per month

upgrade_best_value.description: Label for the best value option

upgrade_choose_monthly.description: Button text to choose monthly plan

upgrade_choose_annual.description: Button text to choose annual plan

upgrade_schools_title.description: Title for schools and districts section

upgrade_schools_description.message: 为您的学校或学区寻找批量许可？
upgrade_schools_description.description: Description for schools and districts section

upgrade_contact_quote.description: Button text to contact for a quote

upgrade_button.description: Button text for upgrading to Plus plan

tooltip_doc_counter.message: 免费用户每月可以分析最多 150 个唯一文档。此计数器在每月 1 日重置。
tooltip_doc_counter.description: Tooltip explaining the document counter limit
